author: psmith
msg: Changed the minitoolbar for this component to be a JToolbar
just like the Receiver panel does.  This gives us nicer
L&F on some l&f's. more consistent anyway.
Exposed an Edit button, plus added a Close button with
associated action functionality to hide the Logger Name tree.

author: psmith
msg: moved a lot of modifying/listener code to the client (the mediator).
better design this way, the client/mediator knows exactly
how the Tree should look, the tree shouldn't care.

author: psmith
msg: Moved out the CloseIcon into a separate class so other

author: sdeboy
msg: Removed unused imports in the chainsaw package.
Added entry to default chainsaw properties (prevents exceptions for new users)

author: psmith
msg: Ensured that all Child nodes appear in case insensitive sorted order.
